# crypto-market-data-ts

> Comprehensive cryptocurrency market data service with CoinGecko, DeFiLlama, and Fear & Greed Index. Built-in caching, rate limiting, and Edge Runtime compatibility.

## Links

- Repository: https://github.com/nirholas/crypto-market-data-ts
- Author: https://github.com/nirholas
- Full documentation: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nirholas/crypto-market-data-ts/main/llms-full.txt
